libdaemon File List

Here is a list of all files with brief descriptions:
daemon.h [code]A header file including all other header files part of libdaemon
dexec.h [code]Contains a robust API for running sub processes with STDOUT and STDERR redirected to syslog
dfork.h [code]Contains an API for doing a daemonizing fork()
dlog.h [code]Contains a robust API for logging messages
dnonblock.h [code]Contains a single function used to change a file descriptor to non-blocking mode using fcntl()
dpid.h [code]Contains an API for manipulating PID files
dsignal.h [code]Contains the API for serializing signals to a pipe for usage with select() or poll()
